title: Atlas Obscura Presents: Traveling Back in Time for Coconut Cake With The Sporkful
description: Listen and subscribe on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, and all major podcast apps. We’re sharing an episode from our friends at The Sporkful. Following an Atlas Obscura Guide, Dan Pashman of the Sporkful visits the Echo Park Time Travel Mart, the underground tunnels of Los Angeles, former speakeasy King Eddy Saloon, and Patys Restaurant for coconut cake.
author: The Podcast Team
excerpt: In search of an elusive slice of coconut cake, Dan Pashman of The Sporkful takes a detour through LA’s abandoned underground tunnel system, visiting a former speakeasy and an unusual store along the way.

html:
Atlas Obscura Presents: Traveling Back in Time for Coconut Cake With The Sporkful

In search of an elusive slice of coconut cake, Dan Pashman of The Sporkful takes a detour through LA’s abandoned underground tunnel system, visiting a former speakeasy and an unusual store along the way.

Atlas Obscura Presents: Traveling Back in Time for Coconut Cake With The Sporkful

We’re sharing an episode from our friends at The Sporkful. Following an Atlas Obscura Guide, Dan Pashman of the Sporkful visits the Echo Park Time Travel Mart, the underground tunnels of Los Angeles, former speakeasy King Eddy Saloon, and Patys Restaurant for coconut cake.
